cards.title: Submitting ...
cards.subtitle: Connecting to server to submit vote ...

cards.title: Cassie's Spotify:
cards.question: Alright, alright, DJ CASSIE CAS with the aux cord, trying to get something popping with 3 banging tracks. What we listening to, fam? Say your piece, now.

cards.title: Doms's Decision:
cards.question: What to do, what to do... Your boy, Dom, has got a dilemma on his hands - sit with T-Money Tarquin and Hugo, or continue gaming with his A one from day one, Jayda.
options: Are you kidding me, it's gotta be with his bestie, Jayda.
Nah, for real for real, T-Money's got bars, so of course we're sitting with him and Hugo.

cards.title: Darren's Dilemma:
cards.question: Yikes, this is not good.  Can Afsaneh get Sepideh to shut up and save her?
options: Yes, let Cassie off the bus immediately.
No, Cassie stays on the bus like everyone else.

cards.title: Afsaneh's Dilemma:
cards.question: Yikes, this is not good.  Can Afsaneh get Sepideh to shut up and save her?
options: Definitely.  Our girl's got the skills.

cards.title: Decision Time:
cards.question: Ash is gonna get stabbed either way, and someone's gotta do it.  So, who will it be?
